synopsis.text: Aoba finds himself trapped in a harrowing reality in the bonus episode of the DRAMAtical Murder anime, titled Data xx Transitory. In this chilling world, every Scrap he undertakes ends in catastrophic failure, subjecting him to a series of explicit, painful, and treacherous outcomes. This episode is a grim compilation of all the bad endings from the original game, forcing Aoba to endure each of these nightmarish experiences in terrifying detail.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
